name: nestoria
description: Nestoria – A customizable photo and comic viewer built with ❤️ to make exploring, organizing, and curating digital collections effortless and enjoyable. Nestoria transforms your digital albums with options to flatten, filter, and personalize your view, bringing a fresh approach to browsing photos, comics, or artwork—all served seamlessly from GitHub Pages. Rediscover the joy of navigating your memories, your way.
author: CornerSyrup <65886108+CornerSyrup@users.noreply.github.com> (https://github.com/CornerSyrup)
